pullRequest.title: Refactor and fix debugger integration tests for new project API
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose
$subject.
Fixes #26909
Remarks
However, few of the test cases related to ballerina test debugging are still disabled until the test support is fixed with the new project API. Please refer #26942.
Check List

 Read the Contributing Guide
 Updated Change Log
 Checked Tooling Support (#)
 Added necessary tests

 Unit Tests
 Spec Conformance Tests
 Integration Tests
 Ballerina By Example Tests


 Increased Test Coverage
 Added necessary documentation

 API documentation
 Module documentation in Module.md files
 Ballerina By Examples

nodes.bodyText: Do we need this completely commented out file?
Shall we enable these tests as well? Do we have any issues in that?
